attachments.title: Optimize DirectX rendering by k-takata · Pull Request #2560 · vim/vim
attachments.text: As reported in the following thread, Vim 8.0.1343 becomes slower on some environments (when using some kind of commands like :ver, :dig, ...): <https://groups.google.com/d/topic/vim_dev/2AaZMN1T6K8/>...
